text: Basurmanovka () is a rural locality (a village) and the administrative center of Abitovsky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 202 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 23 km from Meleuz. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Basurmanovka
